column4: i have a question: i connected my PC to my plasma TV through HDMI. but the sound doesn t go out from the TV speakers. how can i do this?
are you using the pusleaudio applet?
no and i don t know what it is :(
i thought the sound would go naturrally and simply through the HDMI plug
system, preferences, sound
then i could redirect it to my hifi amp
ok but what is it for? what do i have to change there?
then go to Hardware, and under profile
and then choose something like Digital Strereo
if you dont have that option, you will possibly need to edit your alsa-base.conf file
nice tip. i ll have a look then
no problem! ITs quite confusing to find
but will it still sound through the PC speakers? (they re not as bad, and using the 4 of them could be sweet)
no
you get both options under the profile settings
oh ok so it is for GOOD file then :)
i ll have a look
kan somebody kick me from this channel please?
!kick miranda_82
balls
why?
